QuestData.Title: Helcular's Command
QuestData.Description: Our dark rangers search the fields for worgen terrorists. These worgen have been sent out by their dark masters to hunt and kill us. And though a dark ranger is a formidable combatant, the worgen often attack in packs, which can overwhelm even a dark ranger.$B$BSearch the fields around the ruins of Southshore for Bloodfang forsaken hunters. Kill any that you see! For the Forsaken and for Lordaeron!
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you dealt with the worgen?
QuestData.RewardText: We should have killed Bloodfang in Silverpine. It's a shame he still lives. It's an even bigger shame that we have as of yet been unable to turn worgen into undead. Surely there is a way...
